Oh yeah, plot: Satona is forced to be Satomi (her twin which us popular in adult videos), so the man calling Satona “Satomi” is because they were making the movie and tried to not make a difference between Satona and Satomi. Satona is Kousuke’s childhood friend, Satomi is the adult video actress. 1 beauty mark is Satona and 2 beauty mark is Satomi (beside her eyes and on the jaw). Satona was a bikini model, but then got blackmailed into AV because she looked like Satomi, turns out they’re twins. Satomi requested to the board to blackmail Satona because of pure jealous, Satomi lived in orphanage for years and got sexual abused by adults, meanwhile Satona is living happily with their parents. So, Satomi wanted Satona to feel the pain too, but instead, Satona feels addicted to it. Before this part, both Satona and Satomi kept promise for a while to stop making AVs, but then Satona broke her promise and makes AV again, Satomi quitted for unknown reason. See Jeanne’s comment for full story.
For anyone confused the one doing the gangbang is satona and the one that was on the couch is satomi.

So, it's there like a original story of this series?

@HornyHammer The twins shown here got separated, one went to a good family(Satona), the other went to an orphanage where she got gang-raped a lot(Satomi). Satona became an idol and Satomi became a pornstar. Satomi set-up Satona to be her replacement and was going to be "Satona" while the real Satona would be stuck doing porn. Kousuke was a fan of Satona(and also a childhood friend? I can't remember) and eventually put a stop to the whole thing and started dating Satona while Satomi tried to get legit TV roles. 

The epilogue of the original story showed that Satona got addicted to doing porn and went back to it without Kousuke knowing until he sees the DVD with Satona on it, which is where this story starts. Kousuke finds out, which is why he freaks out when he was going to eat Satona's pussy in the bath. Him calling Satomi a "fake" while he's raping her at the end is a reference to the previous story. Hope that helps.
